#include <iostream>
#include <cstdio>
 
using namespace std;
 
int dp[1000005][2][2], a[1000005], b[1000005], c[1000005];
 
int main()
{
    int n;
 
    while(scanf("%d", &n) != EOF) {
        for(int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
            scanf("%d %d %d",&a[i],&b[i],&c[i]);
        }
 
        dp[n-1][0][0] = 0;
        dp[n-1][1][1] = b[n-1];
        dp[n-1][0][1] = a[n-1];
        dp[n-1][1][0] = 0;
 
        for(int i = n-2; i >= 0; i--) {
            for(int j = 0; j < 2; j++) {
                for(int k = 0; k < 2; k++) {
                    int ans, prev, now;
                    now = k;
                    prev = j;
                    ans = 0;
                    int pos = i;
                    if(!now) {
                        ans = max(ans, dp[pos+1][0][1]);
                        ans = max(ans, dp[pos+1][0][0]);
                    }
                    else {
                        if(prev) {
                            ans = max(ans, c[pos]+dp[pos+1][1][1]);
                            ans = max(ans, b[pos]+dp[pos+1][1][0]);
                        }
                        else {
                            ans = max(ans, a[pos] + dp[pos+1][1][0]);
                            ans = max(ans, b[pos] + dp[pos+1][1][1]);
                        }
                    }
                    dp[pos][prev][now] = ans;
                }
            }
        }
 
        cout << max(dp[0][0][1], dp[0][0][0]) << endl;
    }
}
